contents.title: Graph Theory with Applications
contents.description: This book is intended as an introduction to graph theory.
contents.author: Bondy, Adrian, Murty, U.S.R.

contents.title: Parallel programming
contents.description: In this course, you'll learn the fundamentals of parallel programming, from task parallelism to data parallelism.
contents.author: Prof. Viktor Kuncak, Dr. Aleksandar Prokopec

contents.title: Compilers
contents.description: This self-paced course will discuss the major ideas used today in the implementation of programming language compilers.
contents.author: Alex Aiken

contents.title: Software Debugging
contents.description: In this class you will learn how to debug programs systematically, how to automate the debugging process and build several automated debugging tools in Python.
contents.author: Andreas Zeller, Gundega Dekena

contents.title: Software Testing
contents.description: When writing software, destruction can be just as valuable as creation. Learn how to catch bugs and break software as you discover different testing methods that will help you build better software.
contents.author: John Regehr, Sean Bennett
